name: Dagada's Story
storyline:
The story takes place in snowy mountains, where the ruins of an ancient civilization hide strange technologies. The few surviving creatures, known as Daoudaounes, are timid little creatures trying to withstand the harsh weather conditions. Dagada will get to know them while unraveling the mysteries surrounding the mountains, its ruins, and a terrible creature that terrorizes the poor Daoudaounes.

Explore a vast interconnected world filled with puzzles and strange technologies. Dive deep into caves, ruins, and slopes of the Dholgini Mountain. Brave fierce storms, forge friendships with adorable Daoudaounes, and uncover the secrets of the world.
summary: Dagada's Story is a 2D platform-puzzle game set in a colorful retro world with an emphasis on puzzles and exploration. Dive into the depths of a snowy world, exploring a mountain home to a tribe of strange creatures among ancient ruins, as you search for answers to the mysteries that surround you.
